verbs.description: [ARG1: rockland county man] [V: arrested] [ARG2: for building 200 pound bomb plotting to detonate it in dc on election day] a rockland county man cops say built a 200-pound bomb he was planning to explode in a suicide attack on washington d c on election day was arrested wednesday paul rosenfeld 56 of tappan was arrested on federal charges of manufacturing an explosive device as alleged paul m rosenfeld concocted a twisted plan to draw attention to his political ideology by killing himself on the national mall in washington d c — rockland county paul m rosenfeld rockland county new york paul m rosenfeld 200 pound
